metadata.Title: CVE-2012-2125 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low
metadata.Description:
RubyGems before 1.8.23 can redirect HTTPS connections to HTTP, which makesit easier for remote attackers to observe or modify a gem duringinstallation via a man-in-the-middle attack.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-2125` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

bundler - 2.3.15-2
ruby-bundler - 2.3.15-2
ruby-rubygems - 3.3.15-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: rubygems package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.2.5-2').
